results.title: Postmeningitis headache: case report.
results.text_hl: Its frequency increased during the following weeks and a prophylactic treatment with @CHEMICAL_Amitriptyline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000639 @@@amitriptyline@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ was initiated.
